nav.spaceLaunch: ahunmu a wɔde tow hyɛn mu ne asiane ahorow
nav.briefHistory: adwinni ho abakɔsɛm tiawa a ɛwɔ ahunmu
nav.sustainability: nneɛma a ɛbɛkɔ so atra hɔ daa ne ahunmu nneɛma a asɛe

ritual.label: amanne kwan so
ritual.ariaLabel: Hyɛ amanne no mu - Fa din kɔ Orbital Asɔredan no mu

footer.credits: Orbital Asɔredan yɛ adwini a Edson Pavoni yɛe, a ɔne Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, ne wɔn a wɔkɔ so de din kɔ saa asɔredan yi nyinaa abom ayɛ.
